questions: How to check if the current time is within a defined time span using Tracardi?
What is the "Is time between dates" plugin?
How to use the "Is time between dates" plugin?
What is the purpose of the "Is time between dates" plugin?
answer:
# Can Tracardi check if the current time is within a defined time span?
Yes, Tracardi can check if the current time is within a defined time span using the "Is time between dates" plugin
